title: What’s Brave Done For My Privacy Lately #5: Grab Bag
desc: Description of new query-param filters, referrer policy changes, and removing the Reporting API from Brave

title: What’s Brave Done For My Privacy Lately? Episode #4: Fingerprinting Defenses 2.0
desc: Description of all the features included in Brave's new, randomization based fingerprinting defenses.

title: What’s Brave Done For My Privacy Lately? Episode #3: Fingerprint Randomization
desc: Introduction to Brave moving from 'consistent response' to 'randomized response' based fingerprinting defenses.

title: What’s Brave Done For My Privacy Lately? Episode #2: Third-Party Cosmetic Filtering
desc: Description of Brave's unique approach to cosmetic filtering, which heuristically only hides third party ads.

title: What’s Brave Done For My Privacy Lately-Episode #1: Web Resource Replacements
desc: Description of the technique and benefits of resource replacements in Brave.
